meta.title: Domino's DXP
meta.description: The 2016 Domino’s DXP is on the road and delivering pizzas all across the country. Find out if your local store has one at DominosDXP.com/#locations
meta.keywords: Domino's, DXP, delivery, expert, car, custom, vehicle, new, purpose-built, pizza
meta.author: Domino's Pizza
